coded_answer.p: Regarding the programme you have organised, it is a great ideasidea everything that you have planedplannedeverything that you have planned is a great idea, but I would like to suggest to you something that the students saw in an advertisement.

It is a good start to go on a sightseeing by bus on Monday morning, because we can sesee all the famous buildings in a few hours. It'sIt seemsiswill be relaxing to go to Greenwich in the afternoon looking thoughthroughover the river.

The idea aboutof going to the science museum is fantastic,. I read about the museum, and it is really interesting infor science historythe history of science. After all morning in the Museummuseum, it is wonderful and on tuesdayTuesday doing some shopsshopping, whereas the studentstudents have another idea for tuesdayTuesday.
On Wednesday after we have visetedvisited the nationalNational Art Gallery, we can have a chat about oursour next holiday atduring the free time in the afternoon.

The advertisement that the students saw is aboutfor a fashion show, but to go to the show you will need cancelto cancel the tour on tuesdayTuesday and add the show, because the show is from 10.00 to 19.00.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Nowadays the main attroctionattraction in the newspapers and on television is the private lifelives of famous people.

It is really interesting how people like knowingto know about famous peoplepeople's lifelives. Without someone famous knowknowing, photographsphotographers take pictures secretly, and try to get money onfor itthem.
Sometimes being famous can get stressstressful, because everywhere they go there are people around them, especially journalists, trying to ask millions of questions.

Famous people deserve to have freedom to do whatever they want, but it is quite difficult to do thingthings in a public places, because nobody likelikes seeing famous politicians or film stars without asking questions.
On the whole, to bebeing rich and famous don'tdoesn't always bring happenesshappiness, whereas the majority of the population wish they were rich and famous.
